files.patch:
@@ -858,0 +858,1 @@
+          -report:$$$${JTREG_REPORT} \
@@ -868,0 +869,1 @@
+        export JTREG_REPORT="executed"; \
@@ -877,0 +879,1 @@
+          export JTREG_REPORT="all-executed"; \
@@ -878,3 +881,1 @@
-  endif
-
-  ifneq ($$(JTREG_REPEAT_COUNT), 0)
+  else ifneq ($$(JTREG_REPEAT_COUNT), 0)
@@ -882,0 +883,1 @@
+        export JTREG_REPORT="executed"; \
@@ -890,0 +892,4 @@
+  else
+    $1_COMMAND_LINE := \
+        export JTREG_REPORT="executed"; \
+        $$($1_COMMAND_LINE);
